channel.title: AI & Telecom News Digest
channel.description: Daily AI & Telecom insights curated by n8n + Perplexity

item.title: Untitled
item.description: The telecom industry is rapidly adopting generative AI, with half of surveyed companies having implemented their first AI solutions by 2025.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: GenAI adoption in telecoms is accelerating, reaching nearly 300 implementations by November 2024, reports STL Partners.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Deloitte Insights highlights telcos' growing interest in leveraging generative AI as a key growth driver for the telecom industry in 2025.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: AWS has chosen 40 startups for its 2025 Generative AI Accelerator, providing up to $1 million in credits and expert support.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: ZTE advances AI-driven intelligence by integrating network technologies, enhancing smart telecom solutions for the future.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Generative AI, combined with zero trust and quantum encryption, is driving transformative growth and enhancing enterprise security in the telecom industry.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Morgan Stanley's 2025 TMT conference highlights emerging trends in generative AI and transformative technologies shaping the tech, media, and telecom sectors.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: A new report reveals 83% of telecom leaders fear falling behind and urges telcos to adopt generative AI to achieve productivity gains sought by 63%.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: The Richmond Fed questions if current AI investments mirror the 1990s telecom boom and risk a similar market bubble and bust.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Singtel Enterprise plans to become an AI-first telco by investing in AI technologies like network slicing, digital twins, and autonomous networks.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: EY warns the telecom sector faces increasing risks from AI challenges, ineffective transformation efforts, and a complex geopolitical environment.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Malaysia launches Ryt Bank, its first AI-powered bank, while Google’s Veo 3 AI video creation tools become widely available, highlighting AI’s growing impact on finance and media.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: A global study of 100+ tier-1 telecom executives highlights emerging opportunities and practical applications of generative AI in the telecom industry.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: The article highlights 150 AI use cases from startups, featuring Cursor, an AI-powered code editor with advanced generative AI and autonomous agent capabilities.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Generative AI is revolutionizing telecom by serving as a reliable knowledge base for AI-powered network management and optimization.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: PwC's 2025 AI Business Predictions highlight key trends and strategies driving AI-powered business transformation across industries in the coming years.
